problem_data.title: Longest Continuous Increasing Subsequence
problem_data.description:
Given an unsorted array of integers nums, return the length of the longest continuous increasing subsequence (i.e. subarray). The subsequence must be strictly increasing.

A continuous increasing subsequence is defined by two indices l and r (l < r) such that it is [nums[l], nums[l + 1], ..., nums[r - 1], nums[r]] and for each l <= i < r, nums[i] < nums[i + 1].

examples.explanation:
The longest continuous increasing subsequence is [1,3,5] with length 3.
Even though [1,3,5,7] is an increasing subsequence, it is not continuous as elements 5 and 7 are separated by element 4.
The longest continuous increasing subsequence is [2] with length 1. Note that it must be strictly increasing.

[測試#1] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findLengthOfLCIS((),)
  標準輸出: 0
  你的輸出: 0

[測試#3] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findLengthOfLCIS((1, 2, 3, 4, 5),)
  標準輸出: 5
  你的輸出: 5

[測試#4] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findLengthOfLCIS((5, 4, 3, 2, 1),)
  標準輸出: 1
  你的輸出: 1

[測試#5] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findLengthOfLCIS((1, 2, 3, 2, 3, 4, 5),)
  標準輸出: 4
  你的輸出: 4

[測試#6] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findLengthOfLCIS((2, 2, 2, 2),)
  標準輸出: 1
  你的輸出: 1

[測試#7] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findLengthOfLCIS((-3, -2, -1, 0, 1),)
  標準輸出: 5
  你的輸出: 5

[測試#8] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findLengthOfLCIS((1000000, 1000001, 1000002),)
  標準輸出: 3
  你的輸出: 3

[測試#9] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findLengthOfLCIS((1, 2, 2, 3, 4),)

  標準輸入: findLengthOfLCIS((1, 3, 2, 4, 3, 5),)
  標準輸出: 2
  你的輸出: 2

[測試#11] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findLengthOfLCIS((5, 4, 3, 2, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6),)
